title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building the Quantum Future on AWS (CMP357)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上构建量子未来 (CMP357)
abstract: Quantum technologies are moving from the lab to the cloud, and AWS is where that transformation is happening. This lightning talk introduces how AWS is empowering builders at every stage of the quantum journey: from accelerating scientific discovery with Amazon Braket to migrating security services to post-quantum cryptography. You’ll hear real examples of start-ups using Braket build a differentiating capability in materials design, optimization, and simulation, and others helping enterprises navigate the transition to Post-Quantum Cryptography using AWS’s networking and security services. Whether you’re a researcher, developer, or security architect, you’ll leave with a clear picture of how AWS is enabling innovation in quantum computing and helping customers prepare for a quantum-safe future.
abstract_cn: 量子技术正在从实验室走向云端，而AWS正是这一转型发生的地方。本次闪电演讲介绍AWS如何在量子之旅的每个阶段为构建者赋能：从使用Amazon Braket加速科学发现，到将安全服务迁移至后量子密码学。您将听到初创公司使用Braket在材料设计、优化和模拟方面构建差异化能力的真实案例，以及其他公司如何利用AWS的网络和安全服务帮助企业完成向后量子密码学的过渡。无论您是研究人员、开发人员还是安全架构师，您都将清晰了解AWS如何推动量子计算创新，并帮助客户为量子安全的未来做好准备。

presenter.name: Anna Sarnek
presenter.title: Cyber Venture Capital and Startup BD
